stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  TOUGH GRADER  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Literally a walking talking corpse who acts like he is half asleep the entire time. In class I just read and take notes on the textbook because I can\'t follow what he is talking about, he is that boring. I don\'t understand why the school doesn\'t fire this guy. Yes he is an easy A but I would rather have at least a small challenge than him.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  LECTURE HEAVY  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: Kottmeyer might have the worst lecture strategy of any professor I\'ve ever had. It\'s as if his goal is to see how many students he can bore to death during class. His board markings, projector slides and repetitive oratories make you calculate daily how much money in tuition you are wasting. Yes, he is easy, but this is somehow never comforting

comments: He\'s super easy, just pay attention in class. Notes optional he really just quotes the book so on days when I was totally checked out I would just read and know everything I needed to know. He tells you exactly what you need to know for every quiz and test.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Most boring class I\'ve ever taken, his lectures are the cure for insomnia. That being said, he is still a pretty good professor and wants students to understand the material. Many opportunities for extra credit and participation grades, it is possible to go into the final exam with a guaranteed A for the semester if you do all your work.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Very helpful and kind to his students. Lectures are a little boring, but extra credit and willingness to answer all of his students\' questions make up for any negative quality.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Awesome teacher and guy in general! Wants everyone to succeed in the class and gives tons of extra credit opportunities. I would def. recommend him to everyone! im a business minor and his class has been the most beneficial to me so far.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Really nice guy. Knows his banking and econ. Not very exciting lecturer however. Very little book use and tons of extra credit. Very doable econ class whichever one you are taking. I recommend.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: i am currently in his economics class. if you dont pay attention you can get lost, but he wants everyone to do good and understand economics. super sweet/nice professor and gives so many extra credit opportunities. good stuff. and if you need help he is more than willing to explain. I would recommend taking him for sure.
